name: Wanted Together
description:
Your gang of prisoners escapes... But you are linked together!

Coop shooter, 2-4 players, 4 levels,  +15 enemies Gamepad highly recommended ! notes
  • I wanted to put a burden on the player when playing solo... BUT I FORGOTTEN...
  • level 4 is bugged

Controls

join: A / space

move: left stick / WASD / ZQSD

aim : right stick / mouse

shoot: RB / left click

action: Y / space
